about_the_game:
A deadly plague, a forbidden ritual

Experience the cursed life of a hunter once bound by love and family, now driven to uncover the mystery of vanishing villagers and whispered rituals. Journey through treacherous areas of Ricci Estate where vampiric monsters lurk, while gathering an arsenal of weapons and magic. Fight as Belladonna, where death, madness, and the burden of sorrow weigh heavy upon her every move.

Relics of the past, ancient arts restored

Engage with a dynamic combat and magic system, with a variety of weapons that have unique attack patterns, and imbue them with different magic types that alter how you engage with twisted foes.

Explore a world of puzzles and secrets

Solve unique puzzles and objectives throughout the levels, and search for secrets to uncover the truth behind everything.

content_descriptors.notes: Physical violence will be a centralized component in gameplay. Stylized blood and gore are present in the form of severed body parts. The story line will delve into trouble themes and visuals pertaining to mass death, terminal illness, death of a child, murder, and suicide.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 3.5 Ghz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1660 Super
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Darkness twists the minds of those who reside in the Ricci Estate. Once a paragon of class and wealth, the land now lies desecrated with darkness-imbued vampiric terrors. Belladonna, mother of the Ricci family, now returns to her old home to face the threat and put an end to the madness.
